name: Long Beach Flying Club & Flight Academy
about: Long Beach Flying Club & Flight Academy, established in 1980, is a renowned aviation institution dedicated to providing high-quality flight instruction for all levels of flying experience. With a team of certified instructors exceeding FAA standards, we have trained thousands of pilots worldwide, many of whom have successful careers with major airlines. Our facilities offer aircraft rental, 24/7 access, flight simulators, and competitive pricing on tools and supplies. We cater to pilots flying for personal, business, or pleasure, ensuring the same quality instruction for all. Our office is open 7 days a week, and we are committed to being your flying partner from the first flight hour to an airline job.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating"]
